channel.title: Changing Costing. Rep++
channel.description: Anyone know how i can change the cost of an item if it doesnt cost gp. I got a dung system going on, and i setup the pts, how do i change how much dung points it costs? Rep++

item.title: Changing Costing. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

[quote=“str2own99, post:4, topic:405577”][quote author=Get Blitz link=topic=502570.msg3676823#msg3676823 date=1311291669]
ShopAssistant.java Search for

public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {

You will see something like

case XXXX: return XXXX;

UNDER those add something like this and change the amount and id

Case ITEMID: return AMOUNT THAT IS COSTS;
[/quote]u stupid bro?[/quote]

LMFAOO!, Thanks for the rep cheers mate

Read full topic

You will see something like

[/quote]u stupid bro?

YOU Stupid bro? It worked. Moron. Rep–[/quote]

tysm for the rep Orcashark happy i could help

item.title: Changing Costing. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

if its a project insanity server or like hybrid pvp it would be in shopassistant.java, search for public int getSpecialItemValue(int id) {

youll see this

case XXXX: //This is your item id return XXXX; //This is how many points the item costs

just put the id of the items in like

case chaoticmaulid: case chaoticrapierid: case chaoticlongid: case chaoticcbowid: case chaoticstaffid: return 20000;

lemme know if that helps

Read full topic
